sentence.Network_en: Makin said Mr Coombes had gone to the police of his own volition.
sentence.Network_cn: 梅金说库姆斯先生是主动去投案的。

sentence.Network_en: We like to think that everything we do and everything we think is a product of our volition.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们常常认为我们所做和所想的一切都出自自己的意愿。

sentence.Network_en: He felt as though he were in the grip of Fate and had no volition of his own.
sentence.Network_cn: 他感觉自己好像被命运掌控，毫无自主选择的余地。

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...推测“和“非推测“两种意义，如may就有“允许“（非推测）和“可能“（推测）两种含义；will也有“意志“（非推测）和“预测“（推测）两种含义。can/could，may/might表示“允许（permission）“（非推测）和“可能（possibility）、能力（ability）“（推测性）两种含义。must/don't have to，need（否定用法），should/ought to表示“义务（obligation）“（非推测性）和“必然（necessity）“（推测性）两种含义。wil
这种善之所以为善仅在于意志力（Volition），即意志凭自己的能力成就——自在的善。其原因在于这种“善良”意志是受到人类理性制 …
词根及词缀 ... provocative a 激怒人的，激发人的 volition n 意志力，决心 voitive a 意志的.
8.2 ... esthete 唯美主义者；美学家 volition 意志，意志力；决断力 ligate 结扎（血管等）；绑.

list.abs: volition act 意志行为volitional behavior 意志行为volitional behavior disturbance 意志行为障碍.

2.意志行动心理过程意志总是通过一系列具体行动表现出来的。受意志组织和控制的行动,就是意志行动(volitional movement)。   意志行动心理过程分为两个阶段.
1. 意志行动volitional development 意志发展volitional quality 意志品质

phrase.cizu_name: of (或 by 或 on) one's own volition

jx.jx_cn_mean: 出于本人自己的意志，自愿地；志愿地

lj.lj_ly: they choose to leave early of their own volition.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent. (denoting a decision or choice made after deliberation): from French, or from medieval Latin volitio(n-), from volo 'I wish'

entry.def: Your volition  is the power you have to decide something for yourself.

example.ex: We like to think that everything we do and everything we think is a product of our volition...
example.tran: 我们常常认为我们所做和所想的一切都出自自己的意愿。

example.ex: He felt as though he were in the grip of Fate and had no volition of his own.
example.tran: 他感觉自己好像被命运掌控，毫无自主选择的余地。

entry.def: If you do something of your own volition, you do it because you have decided for yourself that you will do it and not because someone else has told you to do it.

example.ex: Makin said Mr Coombes had gone to the police of his own volition.
example.tran: 梅金说库姆斯先生是主动去投案的。

means.word_mean: 1. the capability of conscious choice and decision and intention;

sentences.sentence: "the exercise of their volition we construe as revolt"- George Meredith

means.word_mean: 2. the act of making a choice;

sentences.sentence: "followed my father of my own volition"

auth_sentence.content: It's about volition on a personal and Calvinist level.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's about volition on a personal and Calvinist level.

auth_sentence.content: Those that accepted did so of their volition.
auth_sentence.res_content: Those that accepted did so of their volition.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Those that accepted did so of their volition.

auth_sentence.content: Was it her own volition, was she forced to leave the vehicle.
auth_sentence.res_content: Was it her own volition, was she forced to leave the vehicle.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Was it her own volition, was she forced to leave the vehicle.
